topics.content: A computer system is a combination of hardware, software, data, and users working together.
An operating system is system software that manages hardware and allows users to interact with the computer.
An operating system manages memory, files, devices, and running programs.
Primary memory is the main memory of a computer used to store data temporarily.
Secondary memory is used to store data permanently such as hard disks and pen drives.

topics.topic: Difference Between Primary and Secondary Memory
topics.content: Primary memory is fast and temporary, while secondary memory is slower and permanent.
The Internet is a global network that connects millions of computers worldwide.
Internet services include email, websites, cloud storage, and online communication.
A search engine helps users find information on the Internet.
Cyber safety means using the Internet responsibly and protecting personal information.
Cyber crimes are illegal activities carried out using computers and the Internet.
Digital ethics involve responsible and respectful behavior while using technology.
A word processor is used to create, edit, and format text documents.
Presentation software is used to create slide-based presentations.
Digital documents are used for assignments, reports, and presentations.
A spreadsheet is a tool used to organize, calculate, and analyze data.
Formulas and functions are used to perform calculations automatically.
Charts and graphs visually represent data for better understanding.
Problem solving involves breaking a problem into smaller steps.
An algorithm is a step-by-step solution to a problem.
Flowchart symbols are used to visually represent algorithms.
Python is a high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability.
Variables store data and data types define the type of value stored.
Conditional statements are used to make decisions in a program.
Loops are used to repeat a set of instructions multiple times.
A website is a collection of web pages available on the Internet.
HTML provides the basic structure of a web page.
CSS is used to control the layout and appearance of web pages.
